name: Card Carnage
description:
Please make sure you have availability to Alt + F4 (If the game is set to downloadable)
The game is not finished, so don't expect much.

W A S D to move.
Left click to shoot.

Submission for Jame Gam #26

INFO that should've been in the game:

Spades: Shock effect
Clubs: Stun
Diamonds: Piercing:
Hearts: Absolutely nothing as health hasn't been made.
